Drug Name: Hepatitis a inactivated  hepatitis b (recombinant) vaccine

hepatitis a prophylaxis: hepatitis a adult vaccine / hepatitis b adult vaccine
hepatitis b prophylaxis: hepatitis a adult vaccine / hepatitis b adult vaccine
diphtheria toxoid / hepatitis b pediatric vaccine / pertussis, acellular / poliovirus vaccine, inactivated / tetanus toxoid

Common side effects: redness, tenderness, or a hard lump where the shot was given;
